Job Description: Main Duties and Responsibilities : - The incumbent should have an in-depth working knowledge in software development area with a minimum of 2-4 years experience. The incumbent should have a relevant qualification. The primary responsibilities will include : - Developing software as per requirements from clientsPre-sales teams- Deployment of software on client site- Support and maintenance of software- Assuming additional duties as requested or assigned Desirable Skills :- Self-motivated with willingness to complete a variety of projects with limited supervision in a timely manner.- Excellent interpersonal, written and verbal communications skills.- Strong organizational skills, professional demeanour and behaviour. - Excellent problem solving and analytical skills that allow one to proactively anticipate requirements and potential problems.Technical knowledge(Mandatory) :- Hands on experience in HTMLJavaScriptCSS- Expertise in RDBMSSQL(Any one of SQL ServerOracleDB2MySQL)- Good knowledge of technical architecture- Must have worked on .NET or J2E frameworkGood to have skills :- Exposure to Agile methodology- NLP & Python Educational Qualification : Candidates should be B.E.B.Tech in Computer science
